body:
Ok here are some possible nameplate ideas.

Inspiration-for people who inspire ideas(not apart of staff)

Possibly split 'Media' into:

Youtube- for youtube

Streamer- for streaming

Helper-somebody who points a new player in the right direction

Ten- Somebody in the top ten of the leader boards

SoMedia- Somebody that is constantly in charge or apart of a Social Media Avicus team

Anything else? Comment below. thanks for your consideration! c:

Once again, these are just ideas and the names can be changed.

title: Possible nametage ideas

replies.body: It's not really needed, in my opinion
replies.body_tagged: It's not really needed, in my opinion

replies.body: Helper is not really needed since us Staff Members are there to assist new players if needed. If you have Media, you basically are a streamer and if you are a youtuber, with a reasonable amount of subscribers, you get the famous rank.
replies.body_tagged: Helper is not really needed since us Staff Members are there to assist new players if needed. If you have Media, you basically are a streamer and if you are a youtuber, with a reasonable amount of subscribers, you get the famous rank.
